website_summaries.verdict: A very basic kit that is good for keeping around for troublesome vehicles prone to radiator leaks.
pros: Included hard shell case keeps every attachment, adapter and hose completely secure while moving around
Kit is small enough to store in tight spaces
cons: Smaller kit has compatibility issues with some car makes and models

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a tech at a Ford dealer and purchased this for use at work. It was in my saved for later list for some time, but had best reviews and seems most comparable with snap on version. I use with stant adapter. My only complaint is that pumping it up to spec after getting past about 18 psi has a lot more resistance than the snap on. Definitely worth it for the difference in price. $289 from snap on
customer_reviews.author: becky estep

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the name brand testers
customer_reviews.text: Quality pressure tester. Way cheaper than the name brand ones and it looks the same.
customer_reviews.author: fernando

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sad when a product you can look at a now it doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: Its kinda hard to read a gage that comes maxed out at 30 pounds instead of 0 must systems are around 17 pounds so I put it on a Ford pickup it does build pressure but I have no idea how much with a gage that don't work.

product_meta.title: Kauplus Radiator and Cap Test Kit Cooling System Pressure Test Kit Radiator and Pressure Cap Test kit Coolant Pressure Tester
product_meta.description: The Kauplus cooling system pressure test kit is for testing the leakage in radiator system on a variety domestic and import vehicles. The set contains a hand pump and tester head with 12 In. hose and gauge reads pressure in pounds per square inch, and two popular adapters for 32 mm ID cap systems in both the 9.5 mm and the 15 mm depths, and also an adapter for pressure cap tests. Caution: Always wear safety shield and protective clothing, and do not process the cooling system test before cooled. Stay clear of moving engine components.
feature_bullets: For testing the leakage in radiator system on a variety domestic/import vehicles
Hand pump and tester head with 12 In. hose and gauge reads pressure in pounds per square inch
2 popular radiator adapters (32 mm ID cap systems in both the 9.5 mm and the 15 mm depths) and 1 stand cooling cap adapter
Cap has a rotating lever for fine pressure adjustment and safe pressure release
Tests automotive pressurized cooling systems up to 30 PSI

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
